caption:
Happy National Assisted Living Week! Today is Day 3 of #NALW, and we're celebrating our Assisted Living Communities all week long. Take a look at Pacifica Senior Living San Leandro, located in the beautiful Bay Area, California.

Pacifica Senior Living San Leandro is a pet-friendly Assisted Living community offering a range of amenities, social events, and personalized care to keep residents engaged and independent. Experience a vibrant lifestyle with spacious accommodations, tailored services, and a team that treats you like family.

Schedule your tour today! https://pacificasanleandro.com
